channel.title: CSU R Users Group website
channel.description: Recent content on CSU R Users Group website

item.title: Cleaning and plotting date/time data in R
item.description: Hi all! Today Magda Garbowski will be giving a short talk on cleaning and plotting date/time data in R. The talk will last approximately 30 minutes, followed by an open work session. Please feel free to come by for the talk, the work session, or both!

item.title: Open Work Day
item.description: Hello all! We will be having an open work day today. Please feel free to drop in any time between 3-5 with your R questions, or just hang out with some like-minded R users.

item.title: Welcome to our new site!
item.description: Welcome to the new website for the CSU R Users Group. Here, you will find the latest announcements from our mailing list about upcoming events, etc.

item.title: About Us
item.description: We are a group of R users.

item.title: Upcoming Talks
item.description: 15 April 2019: Plotting with dates and times Presented by Magda Garbowski. Talk materials can be found here. Past Talks 25 March 2019: The apply family of functions Presented by Matt Espe 11 March 2019: An Introduction to Writing Functions in R Presented by Matt Espe
